comment: She keeps her mind on the goal: you making the most of your time, in class and in the future. She doesn't give busy work. Grades are more of an afterthought compared to your work towards your career. No worries about student competition: she grades each individual according to personal progress. Both group meets and one-to-one talks are the norm.

This professor will challenge you.  Do not take her class if you are looking for an "easy a" because it won't happen.  If you're looking for an inspirational professor that really knows their stuff, you have come to the right place.  This professor dedicates all of her time and effort to ensuring that her students have the best chance at success.

Could not have asked for a better professor to be my first architecture teacher. Shes very passionate, firm and fair when it comes to the work, and the class went beyond simply learning the material. She shared her heart and experiences not only to connect with students, but also to show us a mindset and spirit thats suitable for the field.

Best Professor Ive had she really makes you work to improve your skills and you will never have a dull moment in her class. She brings in Architects to the reviews. One of a Kind Professor, you will learn so much from her, she really cares about her students.
Demirchelie will challenge you but her class is not a waste of time. Take her and you will learn more about yourself and why the major is for you.
